name: Hydrocolloid Invisible Patches
about: What it is: The only patch clinically proven to visibly reduce imperfections in 4 hours*, packed with a powerful blend including Salicylic Acid...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Redness, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness..Formulation: Mask..Highlighted Ingredients:- 99% Hydrocolloid: Extracts gunk, flattens imperfections’ appearance, and creates a protective seal..- 0.4% Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates to unclog pores..- 0.4% Succinic Acid: Absorbs excess oil...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This undetectable patch exfoliates blemish-prone skin to help draw out gunk, unclog pores & absorb excess oil while protecting the skin. Designed to seamlessly blend into all skin tones, this patch visibly blurs the skin to lessen imperfection appearance & layers perfectly under makeup...Clinical Results: Clinically proven to visibly reduce imperfections in 4 hours*.Fastest patches available**.92% agree imperfection was visibly reduced (after 1st -hour use)***...*Clinical study of 20 people....Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -99% Hydrocolloid: Extracts gunk, flattens imperfections’ appearance, and creates a protective seal. .-0.4% Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates to unclog pores.  .-0.4% Succinic Acid: Absorbs excess oil...Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Cellulose Gum, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-20 Olefin), Polyisobutene, Salicylic Acid, Succinic Acid, Ectoin.​..The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use morning and evening.  ​.-Gently tear sheet to lift individual patch..-Apply directly onto cleansed, dry skin to cover imperfection. ​.-Leave on for four or more hours (or overnight) then remove and dispose. Reapply a new patch as needed.​.-To keep in place, avoid applying multiple layers of skincare and/or makeup over the patch.​.-Store remaining patches in the pouch provided...Recycling Instructions:.-Outer carton and sheet are recycle ready*. ​.-Separate paper and plastic on pouch before recycling. ​.​.*Recycling is subject to local policies and facilities, please check your local municipality guidelines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, works well everytime. Removes pimples each time and leaves skin smooth
